remarks: Value of the distance function of the induced metric of a normed complex vector space.  Equation 1 of [Kreyszig] p. 59.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Nov-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
imsdval2.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
imsdval2.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
imsdval2.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
imsdval2.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
imsdval2.8 $e |- D = ( IndMet ` U ) $.
imsdval2 $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( N ` ( A G ( -u 1 S B ) ) ) ) $.
